But when things got out of hand he failed to convince her to let it go. If it wasn’t for what the group had just told Padric he wouldn’t have even believe that Aisling was behind the murder that happened to the information broker. But if the information broker really died in such a spectacular fashion, it could only mean one thing. Their plan worked and Aisling was able to steal the Hegemonix.

TITLE: BACK AT PADRIC’S
CONTENT: With slumped shoulders, and a promise that they wouldn’t go to Grace or Malik, Padric explains. The Black Hand are criminals, and Padric hated that Grace was working to any capacity with them. He worried that Grace knew about Malik’s treachery and was okay with it it so long as it furthered her own ends and helped Rhamsted prosper financially to make her look good to the other royalty. Padric probably could have looked the other way in either case, but when Aisling came to town, everything changed. Padric and Aisling wanted to stop Malik, and to uncover his criminal activities to Balthazar, to Kezia, to Grace, or to anyone who would listen. But as they searched for proof that would damn either Malik or Grace, Aisling got out of hand. She got the idea that Grace was as guilty as Malik. As Aisling’s past came to light, Padric worried that their schemes had escalated from bringing justice to Malik, to getting revenge on him and anyone else turning a blind eye. Aisling became increasingly more violent as time had gone on. And the fight between Padric and Aisling that they stumbled on early was Padric telling Aisling he didn’t want anything to do with it anymore.

TITLE: BACK AT PADRIC’S
CONTENT: Remi couldn’t believe what she was hearing. Her father was a murderer too? That wasn’t possible. He was always so nice to her and everything he’d always done was out of love.

TITLE: BACK AT PADRIC’S
CONTENT: Excited to finally depart and get the information they need, Nightingale asks for a discount on gear before they depart. Padric only smiles and shakes his head. But he does let her know that he’s always happy to take money from royalty.

TITLE: AISLING IN PURSUIT
CONTENT: ! Special: Aislings close pursuit of Remi has forced her to kill some nearby monsters.

TITLE: AISLING IN PURSUIT
CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Leg Wound.

TITLE: AISLING IN PURSUIT
CONTENT: Aisling calls out from nearby in the dark. As Aisling nears, remi can hear the sound of her cleavers scraping crossed the rock walls.

TITLE: AISLING IN PURSUIT
CONTENT: Realizing she has no good option, Remi waits for the right moment to make one last ditch effort to sprint ahead of Aisling and out of the cave. As she stumbles towards the cave exit, She desperately hopes that someone has come to help her.

TITLE: PADRIC’S LOST SHOTGUN
CONTENT: After taking some flak for losing something so valuable in the first place, Padric is able to convince the group that having a shotgun could prove to be a huge help in the future. The five depart deep into the nearby Rhamsted forest to find Padric’s Shotgun.

TITLE: AISLING IN PURSUIT
CONTENT: Remi winces as she hides behind a rock to avoid the monsters pursuing her.

TITLE: PADRIC’S LOST SHOTGUN
CONTENT: Not long into their trip, they come upon aggressive denizens of the forest.

TITLE: GEAR UP
CONTENT: Mia, the steward, invites her inside and shows her to her bedroom.

TITLE: A RARITY IN MIDDARA
CONTENT: The group heads back to Rhamsted without incident.

TITLE: YOUR PLAN SUCKS
CONTENT: Beaten back, the party hides nearby and regroups.

TITLE: YOUR PLAN SUCKS
CONTENT: Zeke comes up with a plan and throws a rock to distract the creatures before darting forward towards the cave.

TITLE: YOUR PLAN SUCKS
CONTENT: ! Special: The noise from the stone distracts the monsters.

TITLE: RUMORS
CONTENT: Despite their concern that this might not be the right way to go, Padric assures them that he’d know. Afterall, there isn’t that many secret tunnels people carve out under giant trees in the middle of deserted forests.

TITLE: RUMORS
CONTENT: Not too far down into the passage, Padric’s indignant tone is cut short. After someone fumbles in the dark, the ground gives way. Roots crack and dirt slides and everyone screams as they tumble down into the unknown.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS AISLING
CONTENT: Through her delirium, and unaware that Nightingale has been controlled by a parasite this whole time, Aisling is confused by her actions. She coughs blood and falls to the dirt.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS AISLING
CONTENT: Remi looks on in horror and confusion as the Maluma looms over Aisling.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS AISLING
CONTENT: Controlled by the Maluma, Nightingale delivers a second horrible blow that sends Aisling crumpling to her knees.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS AISLING
CONTENT: Padric tries in vain to pull himself up in an attempt to stop Nightingale from delivering a fatal blow to Aisling.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS AISLING
CONTENT: Aisling taunts Remi, thinking that the youngest Princess of Elenia has her back. Aisling leans in close to Aisling and promises that she is going to take her back to Elenia and have her entire corrupt family punished for their crimes.

TITLE: RHAMSTED JUSTICE
CONTENT: Malik turns on Aisling. While she might not have intended to hurt the Informant her actions weren’t innocent. Malik angrily accusing Ailsing of malicious intent to murder him, his associates, and his only daughter.

TITLE: RHAMSTED JUSTICE
CONTENT: Malik flatly whispers into Aisling’s ear that nobody threatens his family before brutally slicing her neck open.

TITLE: AISLING’S PRISONER
CONTENT: Aisling paces back and forth in front of her, tossing the Hegemonix from one hand to the other. Aisling taunts Remi, explaining that she’s going to use all the incriminating documents she found to bury both Grace and Remi’s father, assuming he’s even still alive.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: Nightingale’s resistance to the Maluma wanes but nevertheless, she holds strong. Nightingale screams at the Maluma to stop trying to manipulate her. Her sudden outburst at seemingly nothing causes the group to worry about Nightingale’s mental health.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: The group hides outside of the house and stakes the place out until nightfall. Strangely, the building isn’t guarded by the city watch and is instead being stalked by two of Malik’s guards in black. Remi admits that these men are her fathers goons and they call themselves the Black Hand. Zeke’s suspicions that Malik was a bit of a villain are confirmed by this. Remi berates him, defending her father’s integrity. Then she takes charge of the situation, leaving the others behind to watch as she convinces the guards to leave.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: Once the coast is clear, the group enters the informants house and stumble upon the gruesome murder scene. The Informant seems to have been literally splattered about the room. Whatever killed him did it in a spectacular fashion and couldn’t have been done by non-magical means.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: A noise from below them alerts the group to the presence of something beneath them. Together, the four search, finding a hidden trap door that leads into the cellar below the house. Down below, in the darkness, a strange woman contorts in inhuman ways and attacks them.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: Not far from Malik’s manor, the four begin to discuss the best course of action. During their debate, Nightingale hears the Maluma whisper inside of her head once more. It claims that it knows how to find the one responsible for the murder and if she would allow it to take control of her body, the Maluma would lead her there.

TITLE: LISTENING TO THE DARK PASSENGER
CONTENT: The Maluma cuts him off, warning the group that their are creatures between them. They’ll need to fight again.

TITLE: LISTENING TO THE DARK PASSENGER
CONTENT: The Maluma explains that there is a cave near the cliffs and that Aisling is inside.

TITLE: SNEAKING INTO THE CRIME SCENE
CONTENT: Seeing the urgency slowly starting to manifest itself in Nightingale’s physical and mental appearances, Remi decides to find the crime scene herself. By asking around town, the four are able to find the scene of the murder. It ends up being a small house in the poorer district of the city.

TITLE: LISTENING TO THE DARK PASSENGER
CONTENT: The group draws their weapons and mentally prepares for another battle.

TITLE: MURDERED INFORMANT
CONTENT: After some discourse with Grace, we learn that there was a murder in Rhamsted. Malik was worried for Remi’s safety when heard the news. Malik was about to send someone to look for them and check that they were all safe when they showed up to his estate. Grace on the other hand is furious. While she knew that her cousin Zeke was present, as the Duchess of Rhamsted she would have expected them to stay at her own place. If something were to happen to Nightingale Arsen or Zeke Jeong on her watch, either family would have taken her head.

TITLE: MURDERED INFORMANT
CONTENT: While protesting Grace’s decision to abandon their quest to find more about Theodotion, Remi accidently lets it slip that they needed the Theodotion Mage to save Nightingale’s life.

TITLE: LISTENING TO THE DARK PASSENGER
CONTENT: The weather worsens as they climb further up the winding path.

TITLE: LISTENING TO THE DARK PASSENGER
CONTENT: Padric excitedly confirms that Aisling’s hideout was in a cave.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Culprit Identified.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: For the second time in two days Remi finds herself back in her father’s study.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: Luckily, Nightingale, Rook, and Zeke arrive just in time and force the man to retreat.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: Realizing the figure might be the culprit, Remi dashes forward, hoping to catch the figure before they can escape.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: Remi excitedly explains what happened. Admitting to her father that they didn’t go to the guards for help but they were able to handle it by themselves.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: The unknown assailant escapes, but Remi is left unscathed and with a description to give her father.

TITLE: THANKS ANYWAY
CONTENT: ! Special: Padric offers a discount for your help.

TITLE: SOMEONE’S THERE
CONTENT: Malik’s expression darkens at the description of the man. He admits that he knows who was behind the attack but refuses to let them get caught up any further in his personal issues. Malik’s temper is withheld so much that he has to tell Remi that he isn’t angry at her. Instead, he’s angry at the man who pointed a gun at his daughter. Regardless, Malik is happy that his daughter is okay. Malik hugs Remi and thanks the others for watching her back before sending them away with a promise that he’ll contact them as soon as he knows more about the whereabouts of a Theodotion Mage.

TITLE: I OWE IT TO YOUR SISTER
CONTENT: The group sees Padric back to his inn, with the intent of one last goodbye before leaving Rhamsted.

TITLE: I OWE IT TO YOUR SISTER
CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Experienced Guide.

TITLE: I OWE IT TO YOUR SISTER
CONTENT: Padric grabs his camping gear and weapons and then the group decides to shop before departing.

TITLE: STRUGGLING TO GET THERE
CONTENT: Seeing it’s nervousness for the first time, Rook can’t help but wonder that the Maluma would have nowhere to go if it died in a body that fell that distance. Perhaps the Great Bounty would claim it after all?

TITLE: STRUGGLING TO GET THERE
CONTENT: As the creatures bore down on the party, the Maluma nearly falls from the cliffs before lashing out from Nightingale’s palms and devouring them. Even though Nightingale suffered a nasty cut, the Maluma seemed unphased by the pain. Instead, it looks nervous from the close call with death from falling.

TITLE: MALIK’S MISSION
CONTENT: While exploring the delightful bustling streets of the coastal town of Rhamsted, Remi spots Mia out of the corner of her eye.

TITLE: MALIK’S MISSION
CONTENT: Shortly into the search, they find the caravan abandoned, wrecked, and in disarray as if destroyed by some sort of explosion. Before they can look for the source of the damage, they are ambushed by wild creatures.

TITLE: MALIK’S MISSION
CONTENT: Mia gives Remi an envelope. Inside, Remi finds that it contains instructions for the town guard. It details Malik’s intent to allow the four of them to accompany the guard while they seek out a missing caravan.

TITLE: REMI, WE’RE COMING!
CONTENT: Nightingale gleefully kills the last of the monsters, relishing in the blood lust.

TITLE: LEARNING ABRAXIS
CONTENT: Charlotte calls out a new round of Abraxis Battle Dice and the participants take their seats by team. Charlotte puts Zeke, Nightingale, Rook, and Remi together at a table and explains how to play.

TITLE: LEARNING ABRAXIS
CONTENT: ! Abraxis Battle Dice: The Pirate Wench!

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: Through her outburst, Aisling learns that Remi is Malik’s daughter. The two argue, and the confrontation escalates to blows. Rook is able to stop them by tossing them apart from each other. But things take a turn for the worst as Aisling reaches in her bag for the Hegemonix.

TITLE: FINDING AN INN
CONTENT: Worried that bugging royalty might uncover their escape from Elenia and get them caught by Yoel, the group is convinced by Nightingale to stay at a local Inn instead.

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: As Remi listens to Aisling make horrific claims about Malik, she isn’t able to take it anymore. When Aisling finally starts expressing her desire to see Malik hang, Remi screams at her, calling Aisling a liar.

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: Aisling shows sudden respect towards Nightingale and stammers as she apologizes over and over again for what happened. Then, Aisling explains her side of the story. She claims that both Grace and Malik are willing to do whatever they can to secure Rhamsted as one of Elenia’s strongest cities in the coming years. Both are capable of extortion, kidnapping and even murder.

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: The rest of them try to explain but are arrested.

TITLE: FINDING AN INN
CONTENT: The group questions Zeke about why he didn’t mention that he had a cousin living in Rhamsted. Zeke explains that his cousin, Grace Jeong, is the Duchess of Rhamsted. But he’s heard enough rumors about her to know better than poke around in her business.

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: They knock, and after a few moments Aisling answers. Aisling embraces Padric upon seeing him. She recognizes the rest of them, but before she can ask what’s going on Padric talks her into speaking about what transpired inside and out of earshot of the people walking on the streets.

TITLE: IMPRISONED BY MISTAKE
CONTENT: Nightingale tries to diffuse the situation by explaining that Remi has nothing to do with her father or the Black Hand. Nightingale pleas to Aisling that this could all end peacefully if Aisling just listened to her.

TITLE: FINDING AN INN
CONTENT: The group introduces themselves to Padric, the owner of the Inn. The man sits at the bar, tinkering with a flintlock style firearms. He greets them warmly.

TITLE: FINDING AN INN
CONTENT: After securing lodging for the night, Nightingale insists to stay up late and drink. Nightingale only gets a single beer in before passing out from exhaustion and all but Remi ends up going to bed earlier than expected.

TITLE: FINDING AN INN
CONTENT: After talking, Padric shines some light on Remi’s situation. Padric jokes that he never thought he’d see a Moretti hanging out with an Arsen. He explains that Malik Moretti has a bad history with the royal families and that while he didn’t officially own Rhamsted, he might as well have ‘owned’ Rhamsted.

TITLE: THE GRACE OF RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Grace and Malik decide to take action against Aisling while keeping Nightingale and her friends away from causing anymore trouble. Nightingale, Remi, Zeke and Rook all protest, claiming there is a bigger threat that needs to be taken care of but Grace has none of it. She tells them that they’ll be staying in the castle until Balthazar comes to fetch them.

TITLE: THE GRACE OF RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Malik and Grace demand an explanation as they have eye witness accounts that the five of them were seen leaving the murder scene in flames. Zeke quickly defends their actions, telling them that it wasn’t them. He points the finger at Aisling, explaining that she was torching the place to hide evidence and cover her tracks.

TITLE: THE GRACE OF RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Their open display of teamwork shows Padric that Aisling was probably right the whole time, these two were in league. Padric makes a snide comment to Grace about letting someone like Malik in on such official business. Grace only threatens him, making it clear that his friendship with Shayliss is the only reason Padric’s still able to run his mouth the way he does. Furthermore, Grace promises that if he intervenes with their pursuit of Aisling that Grace will have him tried all the same.

TITLE: THE GRACE OF RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Malik and Grace seem relieved to hear that they weren’t the ones destroying evidence. But the relief is quickly replaced with anger at the realization that Aisling is the one behind the murder.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Remi’s arrival home is met with joy as the family steward, Mia, embraces Remi in a hug. Upon hearing her father is in a meeting, Remi offers to return later but Mia takes them in anyway.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: After a long wait, a group of men clad in black armor and hoods leave Remi’s father’s study and the group enters.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Malik hugs his daughter and promising to contact them when he hears about a Theodotion Mage.

TITLE: MAKE A BREAK FOR IT
CONTENT: When asked why he’d do something so dangerous, Padric adds that he owes Shayliss more than they know, and he believes Nightingale when she says that the Maluma is a threat to her life.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Remi wants permission to stay at the estate for the night, but Malik protests. He says that the King would be very disappointed if he knew that his daughter was anywhere near his estate. He offers instead that the group stay with Zeke’s cousin, Grace Jeong.

TITLE: MAKE A BREAK FOR IT
CONTENT: In the middle of the night, the voice of the maluma startles Nightingale to wake, instructing her to go to the balcony.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: The group arrives to Rhamsted. To Rook’s surprise, it’s nothing like the descriptions in his books. Since they were written, the small fishing town on the coast had turned into a bustling port city.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Relieved to hear that Princess Nightingale had no formal reason to be present, Malik offers his help in finding a Theodotion Mage but explains it will take a couple days.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: Injured, Malik weakly explains what happened. In the night, Aisling attacked. She used the Hegemonix and summoned an Exalted Esper that tore through his estate while his men slept. They fought her off but not before she narrowly escaped, kidnapping Remi in the process.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: As they near Malik’s estate, the group realizes something is amiss. People flood the streets and the sounds of screaming and yelling fill the night. Instead of an elegant garden and estate, they come upon a makeshift triage. Malik’s estate is in shambles and men and women are injured all around.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: During their meeting, Malik realizes that both Nightingale Arsen and Zeke Jeong are in his study and becomes strangely worried at the presence of royalty at his estate. Remi has to explain the events that brought them to his study calm him down. While Remi avoids mentioning The Maluma or the fact that Nightingale is in any real danger, she lets Malik know that the King has nothing to do with their visit and that they are just her new friends accompanying her to Rhamsted.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: Remi thanks her father. Despite her negative feelings about Malik not letting her friends stay at their house, she’s happy to have finally seen him again.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: Malik promises to keep their escape a secret for as long as possible. Then the group decides to depart before Grace’s soldiers show up to see what the commotion is about.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN RHAMSTED
CONTENT: The group leaves Malik’s estate, then heads out to find Zeke’s cousin.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: Malik tells them that he doesn’t care how they’ve escaped from Grace’s tower or what they’re up to, all he cares about is Remi’s safety. With his men in disarray, injured, or dead, Malik offers to pay them whatever they want to ensure Remi’s safe return. Malik feels that Padric likely knows more about Aisling than he’s letting onto, and if he’ll promise to save Remi he’d never forget it.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: Somewhere, deep within her own psyche, Nightingale screams as the Maluma taunts her for making such a stupid deal. The Maluma promises to keep its bargain, but it makes no promise to help keep her friends alive in the process.

TITLE: ERUPTION OF CHAOS
CONTENT: Nightingale and Padric refuse his blood money, but promises to save Remi nonetheless.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Elias then explains his perils and informs the party of a sort of disease that is spreading within the city  of Hyde called The Blight.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: This confirms that the entrance found was unknown to the Hyde family. Rook is relieved, their discovery was more important than he could have imagined.

TITLE: WE COULDN’T SAVE THEM
CONTENT: !Flag Check: New Ambitions.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Elias then promises to keep her safe. He appoints Damocles to accompany them and to get ot the bottom of the events that are transpiring.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Before they can leave, Elias pauses to look at Nightingale softly. Elias reminds her that he’s the King’s appointed duke in Hyde. He served Balthazar faithfully and helped explore these wildlands before this town even existed. He’s happy to see the Princess herself stepping up to help the Hyde family in their time of need. Her friends were even recommended by Shayliss Arsen herself.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Damocles adds that there was an incident in the mines a few days prior. Not long after the attack on their estate and Rivka’s infection, there was an explosion in the mines.

TITLE: BLACKHAND REVENGE
CONTENT: Together, the two mourn the brutal death of Aisling. Remi boils inside with anger and the two vow to exact revenge on Malik and Grace for what they’ve done.

TITLE: SERIOUS SITUATION
CONTENT: People infected with The Blight devolve into mindless, bloodthirsty monsters called Blighted Guardians. Recently, everything came to a dramatic head when a Blighted Guardian found its way into the Hyde Estate during the night and attack Elias’ wife Rivka.

TITLE: GRATEFUL FAMILIES
CONTENT: !Reward: The thankful families hook Damocles up with a reward.

TITLE: ENDING THE PAIN
CONTENT: Rivka is finally at rest.

TITLE: ENDING THE PAIN
CONTENT: Damocles pulls out his dagger, an heirloom given to him by the very woman he’s about to kill. Despite Rivka’s deteriorating grotesque features, Damocles still only feels love her her.

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: The Celestial Gigas bores down on the party after a crushing defeat.

TITLE: QUEST TO BE THE BEST
CONTENT: The team goes to a tavern called “The Brass Lantern” to play some Abraxis Battle Dice. Hopefully they get some sweet loot!

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: The time spent fighting the massive Lion-Beast proves to be too long for Faust. A long moment passes and the group comforts Faust as he dies in the grass nearby.

TITLE: BLACKHAND REVENGE
CONTENT: Meanwhile, Gage sleeps in Remi’s lap. And as she looks into the fantastic and cute cat’s sleeping face she can’t help but be reminded of her father’s more compassionate side.

TITLE: ENDING THE PAIN
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: A Son’s Love

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: Isla pleads to the Lion-Beast to let them live, she argues they are only doing what they feel is right. Isla gives herself up as payment and as a show of her sincerity. The Lion-Beast accepts the offer, attributing their reckless decisions as a byproduct of the folly of man. However, the Lion-Beast explains that Isla will be judged here and now knowing full well that she is guilty for escaping her prison, and worse, involving and endangering humans.

TITLE: LISTEN HERE!
CONTENT: Nightingale comes clean about their identity and tells the guards of the serious monster infestation in the hidden tunnel below the Hyde Estate.

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: Judgement of Judas.

TITLE: ENDING THE PAIN
CONTENT: Damocles takes Nightingale’s advice. He steps up as the one who must kill his mother. He cannot allow his father to be the one to do it. Elias protests but Damocles doesn’t have to fight long before Elias backs down.

TITLE: LISTEN HERE!
CONTENT: Elias Hyde welcomes them, and has them take a seat before introducing himself. Elias looks worn and his face droops in misery. Behind the expensive clothing and jewelry, it’s clear that something is wrong. Before Nightingale can inquire, another man appears, and  Elias introduces the man as his son, Damocles.

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: Through tears, Isla agrees to the guilty plea. In a flash, the creature brutally tears Isla into pieces, satisfying the Great Bounty.

TITLE: A TUSSLE WITH MORTALS
CONTENT: Showing some respect for Rook and the others for their commitment to doing what they believe is right, the giant creature pays them a reward for their decision in ultimately turning Isla over. The beast warns them that if this ever happens again, they will not be so lucky.

TITLE: THE PROPER AUTHORITIES
CONTENT: With Padric escorting Aisling to Elenia proper, Remi and Nightingale rest near a quiet pond and eat lunch. The two watch with enjoyment as Remi’s new cat, Gage, plays on the pond’s edge. The two debate on what Balthazar will do to Aisling as punishment for her crimes. Nightingale suspects the gallows but the outcome could change depending on her father’s mood after his long memorial hunt.

TITLE: FOREVER MARKED
CONTENT: !Reward: In his hasty retreat, the Celestial Gigas drops a strange artifact.

TITLE: TRAVELING THE DISTANCE
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide.

TITLE: FOREVER MARKED
CONTENT: Although bloodied and defeated, the massive Lion-Beast threatens the party, telling them that their choices were foolish. They are now forever marked by the Great Bounty. The time will come where they will be called to pay for their crimes.

TITLE: FOREVER MARKED
CONTENT: The monster departs quickly, tearing open a pocket of space before disappearing inside of it with a snap of energy.

TITLE: LISTEN HERE!
CONTENT: The Hyde family has apparently already officially called for help from Elenia due to some disease that is spreading. For these reasons, the guards assume that Nightingale and the others must be the help from Elenia that they sent for.

TITLE: FOREVER MARKED
CONTENT: !Special: Depending on how much time has passed, continue to a different scene.

TITLE: FOREVER MARKED
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: Marked.

TITLE: GRATEFUL FAMILIES
CONTENT: Damocles feels proud and Justice feels a bit exonerated as the party turns to leave Hyde.

TITLE: GRATEFUL FAMILIES
CONTENT: The families of the rescued miners can’t let them leave without a proper thanks. They show their gratitude to Damocles and thank him and his friends for saving lives and insists on them taking a reward.

TITLE: STOP!
CONTENT: Nightingale and the others don’t know about any sort of official requested help from the capital, but they nod anyway, playing along.

TITLE: ENDING THE PAIN
CONTENT: Nightingale whispers into Damocles’ ear. She kindly points out the struggle Elias is going through.

TITLE: STOP!
CONTENT: Suddenly, another man bursts in and yells to their Attacker, calling him by the name Damocles. He stops him from inflicting any harm on Nightingale. Damocles is flustered and confused, he turns and asks his father why he should stop from punishing those breaking into their house.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Elias reveals that ever since the founding of Hyde, Hendrix had always wanted Hyde to be under Brahmanian control. Apparently Hendrix always disagreed with Balthazar’s methods of rule. Their longtime disagreement over the proper ruler for the country likely caused Hendrix to cooperate with the Grim Deacons. Elias figures it must have been an attempt to seize control of Hyde for himself, though he still isn’t sure.

TITLE: STOP!
CONTENT: Damocles apologizes and turns to help the rest to their feet.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Damocles is dismayed to hear that his mother’s condition has worsened, Rivka was strong, but the Blight had no known cure. Despite the poor state of his mother, Elias still holds out for some sort of miracle to save her.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Justice tells the rest of them that her friend Zafir, the man who may know more about the Maluma, can be located in the Carrion Swamps to the south.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: The party makes their way back to the Hyde mansion to inform Elias on the events that have transpired.

TITLE: SURI WAS RIGHT
CONTENT: Overtaken with grief, Isla storms out of the Hyde hospital and disappears into Hyde.

TITLE: SURI WAS RIGHT
CONTENT: The group turns their attention back to the task at hand, hoping that Isla will be okay.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: The Maluma whispers from inside Nightingale, it’s dark voice tells her that Elias is too weak to be the one to kill her. Nightingale can’t believe it, but she agrees with the Maluma. Elias is shaky, and as he pulls a dagger from his side, it’s clear that he’ll emotionally suffer doing the deed.

TITLE: SURI WAS RIGHT
CONTENT: Saving Isla from the Celestial Gigas proves to be a double-edged sword. Due to the amount of time spent fighting, the doctor isn’t able to save Faust and he dies in the hospital.

TITLE: TEEMING WITH MONSTERS
CONTENT: Justice assures the party that they are almost to the explosion site. She apologizes for the infestation of creatures and explains that while the presence of many are directly her fault for opening up the walls, the Blighted Guardians shouldn’t have been down here regardless. The human’s she ran into were likely behind the presence of the Blighted Guardians.

TITLE: WE’RE NOT HERE TO FIGHT
CONTENT: Damocles calls to his father, urging him to refrain from arresting anyone. Nightingale helps Damocles stand. Damocles brushes himself off and warns his father that this is the second princess of Elenia, Nightingale Arsen.

TITLE: WE’RE NOT HERE TO FIGHT
CONTENT: Damocles’ father is relieved to hear that they aren’t intruders who mean them harm. He introduces himself as Elias Hyde and explains that he is personal friends with Balthazar. Seeing the Princess in his cellar, Elias mistakenly believes that she and her friends must be some sort of help that he sent for from Elenia.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Elias also reveals that Hendrix is Teegan Patel’s husband. Nightingale remembers the woman who bought them rice balls and her heart sinks. She couldn’t imagine Teegan knowing anything about Hendrix’s treasonous plot. Regardless, Elias is convinced he’ll need to have her arrested and questioned.

TITLE: INTO HIDING
CONTENT: Suri reiterates the seriousness of the matter at hand. The Great Bounty will not forget this decision. Suri leaves them all with a word of warning.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Damocles arrives to the kitchen and explains that his mother is stable, but not doing well. He says that his father has requested alone time and that a messenger will be sent if things change.

TITLE: INTO HIDING
CONTENT: Isla ignores Suri’s warning and thanks the group for their help before bidding them farewell.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: The next morning, Justice and Nightingale chat over breakfast about her magic book. Justice tells NIghtingale that it demands things from her as a trade off to use magic. She believes that it may be sentient.

TITLE: TEEMING WITH MONSTERS
CONTENT: Damocles thanks them again for their help and hopes that all this work can save his mother.

TITLE: TEEMING WITH MONSTERS
CONTENT: They finally reach the wide cavern that Justice had been leading them toward.

TITLE: A FAMILY BETRAYAL
CONTENT: Elias offers the group a stay for the night at his estate. The group has their first night of good rest since Padric’s inn.

TITLE: INTO HIDING
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: Happy Fugitives.

TITLE: TEEMING WITH MONSTERS
CONTENT: Rook hopes that all the death they’ve been dealing will have thinned out the infestation and help the guards in the future.

TITLE: THE PROPER AUTHORITIES
CONTENT: The two eventually rejoin Rook and Zeke and they continue traveling towards Hyde.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: The group follows after the direction that Echo went. Through the door they find a long corridor. Not long later they find themselves overlooking the city of Hyde from a hidden entrance in the hill side.

TITLE: TO THE MINES
CONTENT: Damocles leads the group to the entrance of the mines. The guards eyeball Justice suspiciously and urge Damocles to be careful. Apparently, since the explosion, the mines were teeming with monsters.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: An End to Madness.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: Nightingale finds herself continually looking towards Justice’s spell book. Somewhere inside that incredible source of power might be the cure she needed. Nightingale presses the party to take a look around so that they can get out of these mines.

TITLE: INTO HIDING
CONTENT: Isla is beyond relieved that her beloved Faust will recover.

TITLE: HAND OVER ISLA
CONTENT: The agent of The Great Bounty watches as Isla enter the portal. Moments before she enters, Isla turns to the group and tells them to save Faust before disappearing through the portal. The Lion-beast follows her through and with a loud crack, the portal vanishes as quickly as it appeared.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Nightingale intervenes and takes a different approach to the interrogation. She had a hunch that this jailed girl was the Theodotion mage they’d been looking for. Assuming such, Nightingale tells the girl that she is infected with a horrible parasite called the Maluma and she believes that Theodotion is the only way to save her.

TITLE: FIGHTING TO HER LAST
CONTENT: Elias whispers one last goodbye to his wife before drawing his sword. He takes a deep breath, but it’s clear that he’s shaky and will have a very hard time committing the deed.

TITLE: HAND OVER ISLA
CONTENT: Isla accepts her fate and resigns herself to the Great Bounty, trembling as she approaches the massive beast.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: The group has mixed opinions on forcing someone from Earth to give up their child against their will, but ultimately they agree to help in hopes that Teegan will return the favor.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: Hoping that Teegan Patel can be convinced not to blow their cover, Rook and the others agree to go out to dinner with her.

TITLE: FIGHTING TO HER LAST
CONTENT: Rivka savagely lunges for Elias. She begs for him to kill her so that she won’t hurt him. Elias goes to the ground but is seemingly able to cut her throat before he’s infected himself.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: While walking around Hyde, a woman recognizes Nightingale and frantically runs up to her.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: Damocles thanks the group for their help and together they decide to inform Elias of Hendrix’s collusion with the Grim Deacons.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: Teegan leads them to a hole-in-the-wall rice ball joint and they sit down for what Teegan claims are the best rice balls in all of Elenia. During dinner, the group learns that Teegan and her husband were with Elias Hyde and both Zeke and Nightingale’s parents when Elenia was founded. Impressed, Rook wants to know more about her past but is cut short when Teegan reveals that she needs Nightingale’s help.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: The woman introduces herself as Teegan Patel. She invites the party to dinner and explains that the Patel family is close friends with the Hyde’s. She even seems know both Nightingale’s and Zeke’s parent’s personally.

TITLE: PATEL FAMILY INFLUENCE
CONTENT: !Reward: It looks like you have some leftovers!

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: Nightingale is urged by the Maluma to suggest that Damocles be the one to do the dirty work. Does she trust the Maluma?

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: The party begins feverish searching the laboratory for clues as to how to Blight can be cured. Unfortunately, all the books in the lab seemed to be instruction manuals on how to spread disease, not cure it.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Rook asks if the explosion has something to do with how dangerous Theodotion is, Justice nods. She confirms that controlling such a magic is difficult, and the power that was unleashed was a mistake that was goated out of self preservations. The humans after them weren’t going to let her live otherwise.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Damocles approaches the cell and demands an answer to what happened. The girl only cowers at his rage, scooting farther into the back of her cell.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The Hyde jail was mostly barren other than one occupied cell. The jailer briefs Damocles on the explosion and the events that transpired from it. Apparently someone destroyed a large section of the Hyde Mines and the results were devastating. Luckily they caught someone they think was responsible.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Justice confirms that she thinks she knows where the cages were kept that held them. She claims that there is a sort of operation deep within the mines where the Blighted creatures are being studied. Justice also claims that if they free her, she might be able to help with Maluma issue afterwards. She can’t cure Nightingale, but she knows who might be able too.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: Justice stammers in confusion. She swears that the Grim Deacon Hendrix was with, the one he called Echo, was killed in the initial blast that brought them to the mines in the first place. Justice even claims that she saw her crumpled destroyed body torn to bits. There was no way she could have survived her magical blast that tore down the mines.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Justice stammers, explaining with a sorrowful voice that it was all an accident. Justice tells them that she was in the mines with her friends and they were looking for something when they were attacked by Blighted Guardians being controlled by humans. The explosion was in self defense. She apologized profusely.

TITLE: REST IN PEACE
CONTENT: The warm sun feels good, and the group is able to forget about some of the horrors they witnessed, if only for a moment.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: The corpse of Hendrix Patel sits in a collapsed heap on the ground. Damocles expresses how important the Patel family had been to the prosperity of Hyde. He still couldn’t believe that they’d betray them like this. To conspire with Grim Deacons was treason.

TITLE: SLAIN HENDRIX
CONTENT: After digging through the books for hours, they decide to pile them up on the body of Hendrix and burn the remains.

TITLE: REST IN PEACE
CONTENT: Padric shows the group his favorite place to swim on the coast of Elenia. The group settles down and are able to relax a bit on the beach.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Justice quickly makes a deal with Nightingale and Damocles. If they let her go free, she will lead the party down to where she saw the Blighted Guardians in cages and guide Nightingale to the acquaintance she claims can help remove the Maluma.

TITLE: SECRET ENTRANCE
CONTENT: Believing that this has to be the Hyde Estate, Rook begins to worry that this tunnel was either an old escape tunnel for the royalty, or it was dug for a more nefarious purpose. The group isn’t able to theorize as a crash and a yell nearby signals to the group that they’ve been discovered by someone inside of the cellar.

TITLE: SECRET ENTRANCE
CONTENT: The group tries to explain why they’re inside of his but the man cuts them off with a shout. He accuses them of infecting his mother with some sort of disease before angrily reaching out with magic and summoning a pair of Espers to aid him. The three them move to engage in a fight with who they are convinced are violent intruders.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The jailer explains to Damocles that this girl was found amongst the debris of the explosion without so much as a scratch on her. The whole thing was very puzzling. On top of that, she had a large book with her that confusingly could not be separated from her.

TITLE: FIGHTING TO HER LAST
CONTENT: The ordeal is clearly a horrific experience for Elias and he’s left shaken and emotionally distraught.

TITLE: MINER RESCUE
CONTENT: A frantic man runs up to Damocles while the party is exploring the city. More beasts have escaped through the blown out crater and some miners are trapped.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Damocles reluctantly agrees only after Nightingale presses him on the issue.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: !New Party Member: Justice Bouchard.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The occupant of the cell is a girl that looks anything but threatening. She’s small in stature, with big blue eyes and even bigger circular rimmed spectacles.

TITLE: SECRET ENTRANCE
CONTENT: Inside the cellar is a tall angry looking man with red eyes and a flowing purple cloak. Seeing the group come out of a hidden tunnel inside of the Cellar, the man accuses them as intruders in his house and criminals who are behind a recent attack on his Estate.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: At the mention of Theodotion, the girl becomes receptive.

TITLE: PADRIC’S EXPERIENCE
CONTENT: Having seen ponds like this before, Padric says that they may be in luck if they stay on this side of the lake. Hopefully, The Corpse Collector may already be dead.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: A messenger rushes to find Damocles and the others in the city. The message is urgent. Damocles must return to his father. Things are getting worse quickly for Rivka.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The Jailer points to a cell and the group confronts the occupant.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Damocles interjects and demands to know who and where her friends are.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: When they arrive to the estate, they find the servants all dressed in black. They are ushered to a bedroom where they find Elias sitting next to his wife, Rivka. The poor woman looks sick and pale with a green rot spreading down her body. There is a madness in her eyes and it’s clear that she’s no longer completely human.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: Justice’ face twists in agony. She tears up as she explains that they died in the ambush. They weren’t the only ones looking in the Mines. Now they’re all dead. The humans controlling the Blighted Guardians killed them. When she was finally cornered, she used her magic to save her own life. She killed the people who attacked them.

TITLE: SECRET ENTRANCE
CONTENT: Beyond the monsters and other horrific creatures beneath the Hyde Estate, the party travels deeper into the tunnels until they come upon a solid piece of metal seated against the stone wall at the end of a tight tunnel. The group squeezes forward and push against the metal until it opens spilling the group into a dark room. Looking around, they realize that they are inside of a cellar.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: !Decision: Nightingale may choose to either urge Damocles to be the one to kill his mother, or say nothing and let Elias do it.

TITLE: MINER RESCUE
CONTENT: Damocles rushes to their aid and the group follows intending to help save the miners.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The occupant of the cell wearlily introduces herself to Nightingale as Justice Bouchard. She asks Nightingale how she knows that she can use Theodotion. Nightingale tells Justice the truth. She explains that she didn’t, but that she desperately needs her help.

TITLE: JUSTICE IN THE DUNGEONS
CONTENT: The worst part is that the explosion was so large that it blew holes into parts of the mines shaft that had been closed off due to monster infestations. These monsters were now free to roam the mines.

TITLE: RECKLESS ADVENTURE
CONTENT: The clearing where the pond was located was one of the greenest and most serene places the team had ever seen.

TITLE: TELL ME THE TRUTH
CONTENT: Nightingale begins to inquire to learn more, but Damocles cuts her short and explains that they’re going to see the jailer. He tells Nightingale that her questions would be better asked there.

TITLE: TELL ME THE TRUTH
CONTENT: Damocles knows their story is fake and angrily confronts Nightingale while out of the earshot of his father. Damocles demands to know who they really are and what they want from him and his father.

TITLE: TELL ME THE TRUTH
CONTENT: Apparently, Damocles already has a lead that none of them know about.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Zeke lost the cigarette out of his mouth not long after he watched the Living Oblation get torn apart. He didn’t feel the need to be next, so he opts to hand over Isla and get Faust immediate medical attention.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Rook does his best to help but still doesn’t have much hope for Faust’s survival.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Rook asks how Isla got to Middara in the first place. Suri explains that creatures from different dimensions can create a Soul Bond with each other, allowing them to take physical form and stay in another realm permanently. Suri explains that Faust is Isla’s Soul Bond and to Bond with one from Arkalla is highly illegal. Although a Soul Bond is usually permitted, Suri’s homeworld of Arkalla is one of the dimensions that is off limits from travel. Suri angrily explains that Isla was stupid and endangered Faust by Soul Bonding with him.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: The truth is horrific but they both realize what must be done. Rivka must be killed before things get worse.

TITLE: UNSTOPPABLE BLIGHT
CONTENT: Though Damocles protests, Elias refuses to see his wife turn completely into a monster. Even if a cure does exist, he could never live with himself keeping her locked up for the decades it could take until the mythical cure is found.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Descending from the skies, a massive lion-like creature, three stories tall with flowing feathery wings like something out of the book of Revelations lands nearby.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: The beast introduces itself as an agent of the Great Bounty. Promising that it means humans no harm. Instead, the creature congratulates them for bringing it two lawbreakers. It cordially asks the party to hand over Isla as it turns on the Living Oblation. The red headed girl with the scythe struggles with her injuries and crawls in a vain attempt to escape.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: After a long, treacherous battle, the party stand exhausted, thinking of ways to proceed.

TITLE: LOTUS FOR A CHILD
CONTENT: Teegan is endlessly thankful for their work and promises to meet again one day.

TITLE: LOTUS FOR A CHILD
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: The Patel Daughter.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Then, the massive lion creature turns to Nightingale, Rook, Remi, and Zeke, and politely asks again that they hand over Isla for their payment.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Faust still lay dying and Isla tells them to do whatever they need to do, but Faust is her only concern. Save him and she’ll be happy. Isla turns to the group for a decision.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Rook hates that the Great Bounty police’s their realm for any reason. He feels that those who want to be together should be allowed. Somewhere deep down Rook would like to have Suri with him at all times. But he also knows that Faust will die without prompt medical care. Protesting this Lion-Beast’s wishes could prove to take too much time.

TITLE: COMING CLEAN
CONTENT: As they follow Damocles out into the streets, Nightingale decides to tell Damocles the truth as to why they are in Hyde. She stops him to explain that they aren’t the original help his father sent for. Regardless, Nightingale still wants to help his family.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Dread overcomes Suri as a dark opening tears into the sky above them. An agent of the Great Bounty was already here. Suri whisps away, giving Rook one last desperate look before vanishing in fear at the newcomer.

TITLE: TRAVELING THE DISTANCE
CONTENT: With hesitation and doubt in her voice, Nightingale tries to cheer herself up.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Isla ignores Suri and pleads to the group to save Faust.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Isla is frantic next to the body of her human friend. She calls him Faust. And as Faust lie bleeding to death on the ground, blood soaking his tunic from a horrific wound, Rook worries for his survival.

TITLE: VICTORIOUS ROYALTY
CONTENT: Nightingale and Zeke win the Bellicose fight. Jovial trash-talking ensues.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: Suri begins to usher them to grab Faust so that they might leave. Suri explains that they must hurry before the Great Bounty arrives but she’s cut short as the sun blots out and darkness looms over them.

TITLE: THE PROPER AUTHORITIES
CONTENT: Nightingale is confident that because herself, Remi, Zeke, and Rook made sure to defer to her father about Aisling’s punishment, that Balthazar will be pleased. If she’s lucky, her father might even reconsider allowing Nightingale into the Demiurge.

TITLE: TRAVELING THE DISTANCE
CONTENT: During the long walk, Rook tries to comfort Nightingale by suggesting that curing her of the Maluma could be as easy as casting a spell.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Rook’s interest is piqued by the mention of Grim Deacons. He turns and asks Justice to confirm that by the Grim Deacons, she means the same Grim Deacons that are well known as very talented Brahmanian Spies and soldiers.

TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
CONTENT: Zeke is a terrible liar and the group fails to convince the guards to let them into the Hyde estate.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: The giant beast leans down over the squirming Living Oblation. The red headed girl screams out as the Lion-Beast tears the human vessel into pieces, exposing the creature that was habitating the human body. It explodes out of the carcass like a black ooze, similar to the Maluma.

TITLE: COMING CLEAN
CONTENT: Damocles figures that as long as they are willing to help him with his mother’s situation, he doesn’t care why they are here. More importantly, Damocles explains that he knows nothing of a Theodotion mage. However, if this fabled Theodotion magic was powerful enough to collapse a large section of the Hyde Mines, then it may be related to the explosion that occurred a few days ago.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Justice calls it a pontifex. Or… at least part of one. It’s something Zafir was after. She explains that she doesn’t know what it does exactly, they were on orders from Zafir to get it for him.

TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
CONTENT: There is a sudden scraping sound down in the dark. The group draws their weapons slowly proceed with caution.

TITLE: FREED FROM THIS REALM
CONTENT: !Decision: Protect Isla or hand her over to the Great Bounty.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Finally, and with a triumphant gasp, Justice finds what she and her friends were after. She holds up an irregular white rock in the corner of the room and laughs triumphantly.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: This betrayal sends Damocles into a blind rage. He charges into the room as the debris and dust still settles. He makes a lunge to tackle Hendrix.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: The man assures the woman by the name of Echo that Elias’ infected wife will soon “turn”. Nobody survives the Blight, and Rivka will be no different. Elias will not have the willpower to execute his own wife and will thus become infected himself. The plan is all coming together.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles asks if everyone is ready to continue towards where the fourth man ran off too. They agree, and Justice leads them to the collapsed section she mentioned earlier. After a short moment the group is able to squeeze themselves into a tight corridor. The party continues down the corridor a very long way until they finally reach a thick locked stone door.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles suggests that Justice cause another explosion to blow through the door but Justice refuses, saying that anytime she uses her Theodotion magic, a price must be paid to her Tome. Confused, Damocles simply accepts the answer without further explanation.

TITLE: LITTLE GOLD LIE
CONTENT: Zeke and Nightingale track down Teegan Patel to tell her their fabricated story.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Meanwhile, Damocles tries to get information from Hendrix, but it’s too late. The man’s form twists into something inhuman and he screams in pain as he’s turned into something horrible.

TITLE: COMING CLEAN
CONTENT: Nightingale begins to inquire to learn more, but Damocles cuts her short and explains that they’re going to see the jailer. He tells Nightingale that her questions would be better asked there.

TITLE: MINERS EXTRACTED
CONTENT: Damocles is congratulated for such a brave selfless act.

TITLE: LITTLE GOLD LIE
CONTENT: Nightingale chimes in and explains that Lyle didn’t trust them anyway. Nightingale then promises that she will see what she can do about the situation once she gets back to Elenia. It’s an empty promise though, and Nightingale can’t help but feel guilty.

TITLE: FAUST’S FATE
CONTENT: Nightingale apologizes for not being able to save Isla. Faust doesn’t blame them. The creature was too powerful to disobey.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: As Justice pokes at dark corners in her search, Nightingale pulls herself away from the traces of human still littering the crater to ask Justice more about what happened. Nightingale asks about the people that were after her in the mines.

TITLE: LITTLE GOLD LIE
CONTENT: Zeke exclaims that the Corpse collector bested them and they were unable to snag the Lotus.

TITLE: FAUST’S FATE
CONTENT: Faust lie in a hospital bed in Hyde, making a slow recovery, but clearly heartbroken by the fate of his beloved friend Isla.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Frustrated. Echo responds to the man by the name of Hendrix. She’s furious with Hendrix’s lack of initiative. Echo suggests they infect Hyde’s water system with The Blight. She explains that if they can uproot the city, Brahmanian plans can move forward with occupation.

TITLE: LITTLE GOLD LIE
CONTENT: Teegan understands the situation and doesn’t hold it against them. Instead, Teegan appreciates them trying at all. Before departing, Teegan hypes herself up, confident that she’ll find another way to get her daughter to Middara. Then, she lets them know that she hopes to meet again one day.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN HYDE
CONTENT: Regardless, after going through the plan and cover story, the group decides that it’s going to be too much work without resting first. They decide to unwind a bit and check out the mysterious ash covered city before attempting to convince another member of the royalty that they need help.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Justice reassured them that the Grim Deacons were caught in the blast and makeup half of the bodies here. So there is no need to worry. She seems confident that the blast killed all three of them although there was a fourth individual who did not look like a Grim Deacon but instead looked like a resident of Hyde.

TITLE: TRAVELING THE DISTANCE
CONTENT: ! Reward Check: Hegemonix.

TITLE: SMOOTH TALKER
CONTENT: Elias suspects foul play behind the recent surge of Blighted victims in Hyde. He explains that in the same timeframe that his wife was attacked, there was an explosion in the mines of Hyde. Whatever was going on in Hyde, he requested outside help to help take care of it.

TITLE: MINERS EXTRACTED
CONTENT: At least some of the miners were successfully rescued.

TITLE: SMOOTH TALKER
CONTENT: Nightingale agrees, not wanting to give her cover away. Together, the group rises to leave but is stopped before they make it out the door.

TITLE: FAUST’S FATE
CONTENT: !New Story Flag: A Lonely Survivor.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN HYDE
CONTENT: They approach a nearby guard and ask for more information on where to find Elias Hyde. The guard points toward the sky to a lone manor sitting atop a massive hill.

TITLE: SMOOTH TALKER
CONTENT: Elias requires the party’s assistance in investigating the cause of The Blight

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Both Damocles and Justice seem bummed about Nightingale’s decision for different reasons but they both submit to it being fair. Nightingale is the Princess of Elenia after all.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Fed up with Hendrix’s incompetency, Echo grabs a sketchy looking syringe off of a table and injects Hendrix with its contents.

TITLE: TRAVELING THE DISTANCE
CONTENT: The group continues on their way towards the city of Hyde in hopes of finding more information about the mythical Theodotion Mage mentioned in Aisling’s stolen documents. As they travel south, and deeper into Elenia’s wild countryside, they marvel at the vast mountainous and unforgiving terrain along the way.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Nightingale, in a trance-like state of submission to the Maluma, snatches the Pontifex piece from Damocles. Nightingale claims that she’s the Princess of Elenia and this belongs to her before anyone else present in the mines. Nightingale says that she’ll keep watch of the Pontifex piece until Justice’s end of the bargain is fulfilled. Then, she’ll give it to Zafir only if she deems that it’s safe.

TITLE: ARRIVING IN HYDE
CONTENT: The party ignores the warning and hikes up the steep pathways, making their way up towards the elusive Hyde manor. As they walk, they converse, trying to come up with a strategy on their official story. After their blunders in Rhamsted, they decide to create a cover story rather than go with the tried-and-true “royalty from Elenia” schtick.

TITLE: SMOOTH TALKER
CONTENT: People infected with The Blight devolve into mindless, bloodthirsty monsters called Blighted Guardians. Recently, everything came to a dramatic head when a Blighted Guardian found its way into the Hyde Estate during the night and attack Elias’ wife Rivka.

TITLE: WE TRIED OUR BEST
CONTENT: Although disappointed, Teegan thanks them for their efforts. She decides to try and find another way to get her daughter to Middara.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles knew Hendrix. And hearing the man plot the demise of Hyde and his family drove Damocles’ face white with anger. Enough was enough, Damocles angrily orders Justice to use her magic to blast their way through.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Something stirs inside Nightingale, the Maluma thunders inside her mind. It yearns for the Pontifex piece and part of its feelings impart upon Nightingale and she too feels the need for this artifact.

TITLE: WE TRIED OUR BEST
CONTENT: Teegan departs, letting them know she’s thankful and hopes to meet again one day.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Justice turns to explain that the Grim Deacons are after the friend she wants to take Nightingale too. His name is Zafir and he’s likely to be able to help them out with the Maluma issue.

TITLE: TROUBLE OF THE BOND
CONTENT: The Lion-Beast leans down over the squirming Living Oblation. The red headed girl screams out as the Lion-Beast tears the human vessel into pieces, exposing the creature that was habitating the human body. It explodes out of the carcass like a black ooze, similar to the Maluma.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: While the others take in the horrific sight, Justice begins searching for something immediately upon arrival.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Just then, Remi leans in, hearing voices on the other side of the door.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Justice tells Nightingale that it was Grim Deacons.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Confronted with his anger, Justice reconsiders using her magic. She channels energy from her giant book and focuses it on the stone door. The door rots away as if time itself was destroying it. After the door shrivels, there’s an explosion of dust as the passage before them explodes.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: The traces of the original mine were barely visible. The crater from the explosion that took place was huge and left a chasm that stretched across the underground in a way that was unreal.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles swipes the rock from Justice and curiously asks what it is.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: From listening to the two voices talk, It seemed a Grim Deacon by the name of Echo is conspiring with someone by the name of Hendrix.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles goes to ask more about the fourth man but Justice mentions he ran off into a nearby tunnel that has collapsed. She’s certain it’s where they needed to go.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: The mention of Grim Deacons causes Rook to become increasingly more wary.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Hendrix immediately starts pustulating and turning pale. He screams at the realization he’s been infected with such a pure form of the Blight.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: The group hear two different people talking, a man and a woman. The woman is furious with the man for failing to kill “the Duke and his heir”.

TITLE: THE FINANCIAL DILEMMA
CONTENT: Remi has heard about the corpse lotus before. A corpse lotus in pristine condition like the one they’d just retrieved would garner them a handsome return.

TITLE: THE FINANCIAL DILEMMA
CONTENT: Rook and Zeke both agree. They think that the money would help the group ensure Nightingale’s safety. Afterall, they needed money to make sure that they were properly equipped to get rid of the Maluma.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Justice nods, confirming that Rook is spot on in his analysis.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Damocles overhears and worries at the news. He’s heard of the Grim Deacons. They’re notorious elite killers for the aristocracies of Brahma, the country to the west. They’re hard to kill, and incredibly connected.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Through the dust and madness, the party makes out what’s behind the door. It looks like a primitive laboratory of some sort with cages and vials and syringes and experiments of all sorts. The explosion caused by Justice sent the equipment scattering and the room was now a mess.

TITLE: THE FINANCIAL DILEMMA
CONTENT: Nightingale can’t believe that the others are considering taking the Lotus and selling it after promising Teegan Patel that they would help her. She contends that her daughter could have been told about Middara and could be waiting to come to Middara. Remi contends that she might not. Moreover, not everyone wants to be pulled away from their friends and family.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Before anyone can stop Echo, she disappears into the far exit and escapes through a door.

TITLE: THE FINANCIAL DILEMMA
CONTENT: Now back at the embassy, with Lotus in hand, the party debates on what to do with this sought-after flower.

TITLE: MURMURS BEHIND THE DOOR
CONTENT: Echo and Hendrix were now clearly visible. Damocles had always seen Hendrix as one of his fathers best friends. He had always trusted Hendrix to protect Hyde. Instead, Damocles finds him conspiring with a Grim Deacon and the culprit behind his mother’s impending demise.

TITLE: THE HYDE ESTATE
CONTENT: !Skill Check: The rest of his friends play along and Zeke hopes it works.

TITLE: THE HYDE ESTATE
CONTENT: The party makes their way up a hill overlooking the city to the walled off Hyde estate.

TITLE: COUGHING GIRL
CONTENT: The party manages to rescue a girl in the mines. Her father thanks Damocles for being so brave and saving his daughter.

TITLE: COUGHING GIRL
CONTENT: The girl doesn’t have time to say thank you and is instead ushered away for medical attention.

TITLE: IS EVERYONE ALRIGHT?
CONTENT: ! Special: Remi is injured.

TITLE: GRIMACE
CONTENT: She soon learns why, as Alana arrives riding her Wurm, rampaging through the room and rendering any escape attempt futile.

TITLE: GRIMACE
CONTENT: The fight against the Gatekeepers doesn’t go well for Nightingale, Breeze, and the other hostages. Wore, the Gatekeepers weren’t even trying to kill her, just slow her down.

TITLE: GRIMACE
CONTENT: At the last moment, she ends up with the single surviving Nymph prisoner in her arms, Ursy. Breeze begs her to get the nymph to safety, before sacrificing herself to buy them enough time to escape.

TITLE: GRIMACE
CONTENT: Nightingale and the surviving Anointed run for their lives, not wasting her sacrifice.

TITLE: GRIMACE
CONTENT: ! New Flag: Fallen Friend

TITLE: ROBED FIGURES
CONTENT: They break into the lair moments later, a vast space filled with cages and corpses. Breeze runs through it, searching for the other members of her tribe, and is horrified to learn that Alana ate them first.

TITLE: RETREATING WURM
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Key Defeat

TITLE: RETREATING WURM
CONTENT: The fight with Alana doesn’t go as well for her as she expects, as the group manages to beat her back, weakening her Wurm and nearly killing them both. She’s forced to retreat underground to avoid being killed.

TITLE: RETREATING WURM
CONTENT: Rook insits they go right back underground to find her, but no one else has enough energy for the task. He’s outvoted, as everyone else says they need to rest before they can go back down. They’re all wounded and exhausted from the fight, and getting themselves killed won’t help Nightingale.

TITLE: RETREATING WURM
CONTENT: The group returns to the surface, finding Nightingale isn’t waiting for them at the camp.

TITLE: RETREATING WURM
CONTENT: The group tries to follow, but they’re not fast enough, and they can’t tunnel like the Wurm can. It tunnels away into the darkness, leaving them behind.

TITLE: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD
CONTENT: ! Special: Rook is injured.

TITLE: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?
CONTENT: Eventually the rest of the group arrives, arguing about the difficulties they had finding the tome.

TITLE: MEANINGFUL LOSS
CONTENT: Once they escape, Justice has a moment to recover, and apologizes for almost getting them killed. Though dejected over not collecting this new book of knowledge, she’s still confident she knows the purpose of the Pontifex, so maybe it wasn’t all for nothing.

TITLE: MEANINGFUL LOSS
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Rested

TITLE: MEANINGFUL LOSS
CONTENT: The tree-monster is just too powerful to overcome, and Zeke is nearly killed by its attacks. Justice is knocked out before she can reach the tome. Zeke makes his way over, rousing her so that they can try to escape.

TITLE: MEANINGFUL LOSS
CONTENT: Justice resists, unwilling to leave without the book, and he has to drag her out rather than leave her to die.

TITLE: MEANINGFUL LOSS
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

TITLE: ONE GIRL, TWO BOOKS
CONTENT: Zeke is upset that they didn’t go back for help, but Justice insists they made the right choice. Her book is the entire reason the Anointed came to these ruins, and the knowledge inside might save Nightingale.

TITLE: WURM EN ROUTE
CONTENT: Nightingale and the Anointed escape from the ruins of the library, and reunite with the rest of the group on the surface. They immediately try to flee Gehenna, but they don’t make it very far before Alana and her Wurm emerge from underground to block the way.

TITLE: SOMETHING’S COMING
CONTENT: Rook stays awake through the night, keeping watching over a resting Remi. After several hours alone, Gaige alerts him to the approach of dangerous creatures from the darkness.

TITLE: SOMETHING’S COMING
CONTENT: At first it seems that he’s going to have to fight them alone, but Suri manifests to assist him, willing to risk the Great Bounty noticing her to keep Rook safe. They will have to fight together.

TITLE: A DISTANT SOUND
CONTENT: Though he did his best to keep awake and protect Remi, Rook eventually fell asleep.

TITLE: I’LL REPAY YOU ONE DAY
CONTENT: Reward: Homemade Brooch

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: While she’s reading, Damocles ignores her advice and tampers with one of the artifacts, releasing a gigantic tree-monster from within which immediately attacks them.

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: Justice warns them not to touch anything, as she investigates an ancient tome held in protective glass. She seems excited with the secrets it contains, and hopes to be able to take it back to translate it fully on the surface.

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: Justice is losing steam, worried about the members of the Anointed and the fact that they haven’t encountered anyone else yet despite traveling so far. Zeke reassures her that they’re bound to find them eventually, they just have to keep looking. They have to be down here somewhere.

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: Justice is unwilling to run, and tries to get past it to the tome, forcing Zeke and Damocles to fight their way after her.

TITLE: A CURIOUS ROOM
CONTENT: Damocles calls them over, revealing the entrance to a massive chamber that proves to be their destination. It holds numerous strange arcane objects, preserved from the jungle’s rot thanks to the great depth.

TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
CONTENT: Even out in the open, Alana and her wurm are just too powerful to defeat. Everyone is beaten back one by one. Alana dismounts her wurm, and advances on Nightingale, choosing her as the first to kill. But before she can reach her, she turns and screams in horror.

TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
CONTENT: Breeze uses an incredible surge of nature magic to strike the monster, tearing it in half. She’s defenseless by the time Alana reaches her, and she’s dispatched easily, falling bleeding to the floor.

TITLE: A PANICKED RUN
CONTENT: Zeke, Justice, and Damocles are unable to fight the gatekeeper, despite their best efforts. Zeke and Justice do their best to hold her off, getting the crap beaten out of them in the process.

TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
CONTENT: Nightingale does her best to comfort the devastated Ursy, crying with her in the ruins.

TITLE: A PANICKED RUN
CONTENT: Damocles eventually discovers a hidden exit, and they sprint desperately to get away, locking the door behind them with Justice’s magic and running for their lives.

TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
CONTENT: Ursy is there moments later, with her own magic. She stabs Alana from behind. But too late. Breeze has time for a final goodbye, then falls dead.

TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
CONTENT: ! New Flag: Fallen Friend

TITLE: A SAFER PLACE
CONTENT: Together with the Anointed, the group finally defeats Alana. They kill the wurm, severing each of its remaining heads. Eventually Alana is on the ground, crawling away from them. She taunts Nightingale, arguing that she has no right to judge. All Alana wanted was immortality, something that Nightingale already had.

TITLE: A SAFER PLACE
CONTENT: ! New Flag: Last of her Coterie

TITLE: WINDING DOWN
CONTENT: Justice, Zeke, and Damocles have defeated the Gatekeepers protecting the archives. Zeke urges them to return to the rest of the group.

TITLE: INDEPENDENT BRAVERY
CONTENT: Breeze leads Nightingale directly to Alana’s lair, past the remains of many dead creatures. She laments the death of her tribe, which Alana has almost completely butchered by now. The Maluma warns Nightingale that the path they’re on is extremely dangerous, but Breeze insists that Alana will be out looking for her newly gathered prey, and while she’s doing that they can free anyone trapped in her lair.

TITLE: THE ARCHIVES
CONTENT: It’s filled with rotting corpses, and there’s a huge opening in the floor used by some burrowing creature. There are also three guardians watching over the archives, Gatekeepers who emerge from the shadows and attack.

TITLE: THE ARCHIVES
CONTENT: Justice leads half of the group through Gehenna until she reaches a magically sealed door. She opens it using her magic, exposing the archives within. Though the books and artifacts within are in pristine condition, the archives have been converted into a monster’s den.

TITLE: BLACK TICKET REDEMPTION
CONTENT: Before Alana can kill her, a dozen Black Hand agents appear from the shadows with crossbows and magic. They unleash everything they have against Alana, tearing her apart in seconds.

TITLE: DANGEROUS SPLIT
CONTENT: Once everyone is convinced, Justice leads half the group away, down into the archives.

TITLE: BLACK TICKET REDEMPTION
CONTENT: Zafir wants to know who they are, and Remi explains a little of what happened in Rhamsted. Considering their results, Zafir is thrilled they arrived in time.

TITLE: BLACK TICKET REDEMPTION
CONTENT: When the smoke clears, their leader helps Remi from the rubble, and informs them that their debt has been repaid. They take back the black ticket, burning it before their eyes.

TITLE: SAFE RESTING
CONTENT: After a brief agreement, they agree, and Justice leads the way down towards the forbidden section.

TITLE: SAFE RESTING
CONTENT: Zeke expresses dissatisfaction with just waiting for Remi to recover, given they’re separated and Nightingale could be in danger. He suggests going with Justice and Damocles to find information about the Pontifex, while Rook protects Remi.

TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
CONTENT: After wandering until no one in the group has the energy to keep going, they make a desperate camp in an empty chamber so they can rest and treat the injured.

TITLE: A PAINFUL END
CONTENT: Nightingale is conscious long enough to feel the Maluma’s pleasure at acquiring a much more powerful host before she’s killed.

TITLE: NIGHTINGALE ALONE
CONTENT: After some deliberation, they agree to work together to rescue whoever they can, and Breeze leads Nightingale down another path through Gehenna.

TITLE: NIGHTINGALE ALONE
CONTENT: She rests uneasily in the empty camp, until the library begins to shake itself apart. A strange nymph appears from the darkness, saying that something has triggered her trap. Nightingale demands the return of her friends, and the Nymph responds that she can die like them too.

TITLE: NIGHTINGALE ALONE
CONTENT: Nightingale stands at the edge of the trapdoor, and nearly jumps in after her friends. But the Maluma persuades her that the fall is much too risky, and so she decides to wait for her friends to return.

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: After some discussion, Justice explains that she now understands what the Pontifex actually does. It’s a key, able to seal and unseal esper of all kinds. A supernatural skeleton key.

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: After surviving the confrontation with Alana, the group joins the Anointed in their old camp. Instead of resting right away, Nightingale meets with Zafir and justice to discuss what has happened.

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: Before they can tell him the truth, the Maluma reveals itself to Nightingale, warning her frankly that Zafir is one of its old enemies, and if he learns it has infested her, then Zafir will stop at nothing to get it out, even if that means killing her. She stops Rook from telling Zafir about it just in time. Instead she tells Zafir that she’s the princess, and lies about her civic duty.

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: ! Special: All party members are no longer injured

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: The injured members of the group are finally able to receive magical treatment, recovering from their wounds.

TITLE: A GEHENNA MORNING
CONTENT: Justice confirms that the Maluma was telling the truth, and that Zafir has killed its previous hosts. She seems confident that she’ll be able to make sure this time goes better so long as she makes the case. Nightingale and Zeke are frustrated with her, but she promises to make the case for Nightingale that night.

TITLE: DEEPER INTO THE LIBRARY
CONTENT: It opens, revealing a dead member of the Anointed, Jakobe, who had been trapped there. Justice is upset she couldn’t be there to save him. The group collects his valuables and continues forward.

TITLE: NEW REVELATIONS
CONTENT: ! Reward: Portent of Brutality Discipline

TITLE: DEEPER INTO THE LIBRARY
CONTENT: Zeke asks if Suri knows how to translate them, but she says it’s much too ancient and she can’t be of any help. She explains that Arkalla is a vast realm with many creatures, including her own kind the Antargatis Siren. They don’t know everything every other species ever built.

TITLE: DEEPER INTO THE LIBRARY
CONTENT: After wandering for some time, the group comes to a dead end covered in strange symbols.

TITLE: NEW REVELATIONS
CONTENT: Justice shows Nightingale the tome she managed to extract form the archive, convinced that the secrets it contains will allow her to eventually kill the Maluma.

TITLE: FUMBLING ALONG
CONTENT: The ruins are badly infested, and what’s worse they’ve been filled with dangerous traps. The group is overwhelmed, and is beaten into a corner.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: MY COLLECTION IS HUGE!
CONTENT: Rook and Remi seem confident they’ll be able to triumph easily, though ultimately the dice will decide.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
CONTENT: Nightingale discovers Ursy alone in a dark corner of the camp, obviously traumatized after what she suffered. She does her best to comfort the nymph, but Ursy is heartbroken beyond reason. In her mind, her entire world is gone, entire tribe slaughtered.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
CONTENT: Ursy explains that though Nymphs don’t live very long, they do contain a seed inside them, which can germinate into the next generation after their death. She’s heartbroken that those Alana consumed were destroyed, but then seems relieved when she realizes that there were others in her village who hadn’t been planted yet.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
CONTENT: Flag Requirement: Last of Her Coterie

TITLE: HOPE FOR A FUTURE
CONTENT: Ursy expresses her gratitude towards the group for helping her, proclaiming that Breeze knew how to pick good friends, and she would’ve been lost without them.

TITLE: HOPE FOR A FUTURE
CONTENT: After a difficult battle, Ursy eventually gathers up the seeds, packing them away in a safe, dry container for transport. She can’t stay to raise them, so she’s going to bring them along.

TITLE: HOPE FOR A FUTURE
