CONTENT: ! New Flag: Seeds of Her People

TITLE: HOPE FOR A FUTURE
CONTENT: They leave together, with Ursy carefully sheltering the seeds from here on.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
CONTENT: Rook volunteers to retrieve it for her, and gathers the others. It was only a tree that took it, after all. But Damocles, Nightingale, and Zeke know better. Even so, it’s too late to refuse, and so they set off.

TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
CONTENT: Remi approaches Rook, who has been watching Lakshmi trade with the Anointed. He explains that he’s trying to understand gatekeepers, and make sense of their motivations. Remi discourages him from pestering her, but Rook ignores her.

TITLE: CAGES
CONTENT: Nightingale wakes bruised and bloody, discovering that she’s trapped inside a cage. She isn’t alone though: the members of the Anointed they’ve been looking for are all around her. A man introduces himself as Zafir, and explains how futile their escape attempts have been. Breeze is trapped too, along with the only surviving Nymph, Ursy.

TITLE: ONE KEY FOR ONE DOOR
CONTENT: ! Reward: Chalice of Manala

TITLE: FOOTSTEPS AND BARE FEET
CONTENT: Zafir urges them to make their escape now, or else be discovered by Alana and die too. Together they make their escape, limping free of Alana’s lair.

TITLE: CAGES
CONTENT: The Maluma instantly recognizes Zafir, and stops waiting passively for Nightingale to be killed. It grants her new powers in order to cut through the bars and lead an escape. The Anointed see her do it, though considering how desperate the situation is they don’t press her for answers right then.

TITLE: CAGES
CONTENT: ! New Flag: Slipping +1

TITLE: FOOTSTEPS AND BARE FEET
CONTENT: Though the gatekeepers are dangerous enemies, Nightingale and the Anointed are able to overwhelm them. As the last is finally destroyed, the nymphs begin searching through the corpses for any sign of their tribe. Breeze and Ursy are on the edge of a breakdown.

TITLE: CAGES
CONTENT: ! Reward: The Feasting Discipline

TITLE: ROOK THE RESCUER
CONTENT: Eventually the group discovers the path deeper into the library, and continues deeper.

TITLE: MAYBE WE CAN PICK THE LOCK
CONTENT: Though the group does their best to retrieve the missing key, the swamp’s monsters are just too much for them to overcome, and they’re forced to retreat back to Gehenna.

TITLE: ROOK THE RESCUER
CONTENT: After desperate combat through the ruins of Gehenna, the group finally overcomes the worst of the monstrous infestation. Rook leads them through many dangerous traps, assuring Remi that she isn’t responsible for their difficulty.

TITLE: MAYBE WE CAN PICK THE LOCK
CONTENT: ! Reward: Gage’s Collar

TITLE: MAYBE WE CAN PICK THE LOCK
CONTENT: As a reward for trying to help, she removes a cat’s collar from her stock, offering it to Remi for Gage.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: After a day to recover, the group gathers together for dinner in the old camp. Justice makes her way over, trailing behind an agitated Zafir and the rest of the anointed. Zafir is furious with Nightingale, explaining that she’s lied about the Maluma.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Zafir apologizes for having to do it, believing Nightingale dead a long time ago, and everything that she’s done since the work of the Maluma trying to trick them.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: The Maluma begs Nightingale to run right then, telling her that Zafir is going to try to kill her, but Nightingale refuses to listen to it.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: After failing to convince him to let them go, Justice blasts the trap with her Theodotian magic, tearing it apart and freeing the group inside. She’s forced to flee into the jungle from the Anointed.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: Zeke runs after her, while the rest of the group retreats another way.

TITLE: MAIN QUEST: A DANGEROUS SITUATION
CONTENT: ! Special: Zeke is Unselectable

TITLE: A TIRING MEETING
CONTENT: Nightingale is furious with herself, though Rook seems cautiously willing to believe what Zafir said about the Maluma’s goals. Maybe it really is trying to free an evil god, and they could be playing into its desires.

TITLE: DON’T FIGHT, JUST RUN
CONTENT: Remi apologizes for causing them to fail, feeling that she’s the reason they’re unable to fight. Rook dismisses her fears, insisting that she shouldn’t feel guilty for being hurt.

TITLE: A TIRING MEETING
CONTENT: Suri appears, urging the group to retreat from the swamps and gather allies. They ignore her, instead deciding to rest for a bit until the Anointed are asleep, then try to sneak into camp to rescue their friends.

TITLE: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE
CONTENT: Suri is defensive about his accusations, insisting unconvincingly that her interest in Rook is purely academic.

TITLE: DON’T FIGHT, JUST RUN
CONTENT: Eventually they find a path forward, and proceed deeper into the library.

TITLE: DON’T FIGHT, JUST RUN
CONTENT: The group is completely overwhelmed by the monsters that have infested the ruins. Eventually they’re forced to run for their lives. Padric carries Remi for a bit to allow Rook to cover their retreat.

TITLE: ECHO FROM THE PAST
CONTENT: Eventually her Esper arrives, forcing her to fight. Zafir is unwilling to lift his weapon against her, but the other Anointed rush to his defense.

TITLE: ECHO FROM THE PAST
CONTENT: Meanwhile, Justice and Zeke have been beaten and restrained outside the Anointed camp. While Justice waits for Zafir’s judgement, she notices a figure approaching from the jungle. At first she hopes it might be their rescue, but the one who emerges is Echo, fully healed. She doesn’t alert the Anointed to her arrival, hoping that she might be willing to let them free.

TITLE: ECHO FROM THE PAST
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

TITLE: ECHO FROM THE PAST
CONTENT: Instead, Echo puts her knife to Justice’s neck, demanding that she tell her where the Pontifex piece has been taken. Justice refuses, and would be killed, except that Zeke starts throwing rocks. Before Echo can finish what she’s doing, the commotion rouses the Anointed, who rush in to see what’s going on.

TITLE: ECHO FROM THE PAST
CONTENT: Zafir is amazed to see Echo there, and is almost unwilling to believe she could even be alive. Echo begs him to give her the Pontifex piece and let her go, since she doesn’t want to hurt him. But Zafir refuses, insisting that keeping it from Charon is more important than anything.

TITLE: IS EVERYONE ALRIGHT?
CONTENT: Suri appears to warn everyone that there shouldn’t be traps in the library. Someone has been making changes, and they know the city well enough to be dangerous.

TITLE: AT LEAST WE FELL TOGETHER
CONTENT: ! Special: Nightingale is

TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
CONTENT: ! Special: Justice is no longer Unelectable.

TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
CONTENT: Nightingale tries to find her location by asking the Maluma, but it only laughs in her face.

TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
CONTENT: Nightingale wanders through the camp, past the corpses of the fallen members of the Anointed. She can’t help but feel guilt for killing Zafir, even though he was hardly kind to her. The Maluma appears, furious with her. Charon apparently wanted him, and by killing him the Maluma will be unable to appease its master.

TITLE: LIBRARY OF GEHENNA
CONTENT: Together they get the library open, and Nightingale leads the way. She briefly struggles against the Maluma, which is manipulating her into seeing things that aren’t there.

TITLE: LIBRARY OF GEHENNA
CONTENT: Nightingale realizes that a small female figure she sees lurking in the corner is real, and she warns Nightingale to leave. Before she can ask for an explanation, the figure darts away.

TITLE: LIBRARY OF GEHENNA
CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

TITLE: LIBRARY OF GEHENNA
CONTENT: While the others are getting things ready, Zeke discovers some valuable loot hanging from the ruins. It’s booby-trapped, and everyone but Nightingale vanishes down a trapdoor.

TITLE: LIBRARY OF GEHENNA
CONTENT: The group discovers evidence that the Anointed passed through the library, and they set up camp for the evening in the same place.

TITLE: A STRANGE ENCOUNTER
CONTENT: After searching Gehenna for some time, the group eventually comes upon the Great Library, a massive overgrown structure slowly crumbling away. As they reach the entrance, they encounter a figure emerging from inside, and they can tell she isn’t human.

TITLE: A STRANGE ENCOUNTER
CONTENT: She warns the group to avoid her sisters, because they’re unlikely to be peaceful.

TITLE: OPPORTUNE AMBUSH
CONTENT: They make their way in easily, since all the guards are now fighting Echo. By the time they arrive, the discover Echo easily holding her own against the Anointed. For a moment they seem unsure of what to do, but Padric insists they should help the Anointed. At least they can be reasoned with—they can decide what to do after Echo has been defeated.

TITLE: OPPORTUNE AMBUSH
CONTENT: As they approach the location of camp, Padric climbs up high with a spyglass to see what’s going on. At first he can’t see anything useful in the camp itself, but eventually he can see Echo’s Esper rising above the trees.

TITLE: UNPLANNED AMBUSH
CONTENT: The group makes their way in as quickly as they can. Echo seems to be winning easily, particularly since Zafir is unwilling to fight her. Instead he watches by the sidelines as Echo easily cuts through members of his organization.

TITLE: LET’S GET OUT OF HERE!
CONTENT: Remi eventually catches up with her and comforts her. Even so, her mental state is fading fast.

TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE

CONTENT: Padric reminds Shayliss that doing dangerous things comes with being a member of the Arsen family, as evidenced by their flight over the Middle Passage at that moment.

TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
CONTENT: Nightingale mocks it, pointing out that the Maluma is only afraid because it too would be captured. They ignore it and continue on.

TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS

TITLE: PROTECTING THE PEOPLE
CONTENT: Ursy approaches the throne with Abigail. She’s grateful for everything she received, and wants to return the favor.

TITLE: WHAT’S ANOTHER MONSTER

TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ

TITLE: PUNISHMENT
CONTENT: Zafir pleads to be allowed to help, but Tyrial ignores him, and Shayliss won’t speak for him.

In the process it confirms the truth of the Anointed’s story, about Charon’s imprisonment in the Suspended Tomb. TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ

TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
CONTENT: At first Shayliss is filled with joy as her vision opens during a wedding. There is the woman she loves, waiting.

TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
CONTENT: Her dead older brother Dominic is waiting for her. She tries to persuade him not to go on the trip that gets him killed, but realizes swiftly that she can’t do anything to change the past.

TITLE: A DARK VISIT
CONTENT: Nightingale leads the way, the first to fight whatever they encounter. She’s not afraid anymore, the Maluma floats around beside her every moment. Compared to the parasite strangling her soul, how can any monster frighten her?

CONTENT: The Shadow Lord finally takes notice of the Maluma, remarking that it’s going to win two souls from her.

TITLE: A DARK VISIT
CONTENT: Nightingale says that she doesn’t care if they get killed, they deserve it for breaking the Aegis stone. Even so, she asks where they are.

TITLE: A DARK VISIT
CONTENT: Nightingale asks more respectfully, and this time the Shadow Lord answers. It appreciates the work of a serial killer, considering her a fellow craftsman.

TITLE: THEN LEAVE US BOTH
CONTENT: Nightingale joins Zafir to fight, forcing everyone to follow.

TITLE: COWARDS
CONTENT: Nightingale remembers her promise, and refuses to do so. She chides her friends, then charges into battle, forcing the others to follow.

TITLE: ROYAL COMMISSION
CONTENT: While trapped inside the coffin, Padric is assaulted with visions of a time recently after arriving in Middara. He remembers expecting to work for years on all the royal orders of handmade firearms he’d accepted.

TITLE: ROYAL COMMISSION
CONTENT: Shayliss offers to get him out, by getting him a contract with the crown. He’s finally free of his workshop, and able to go out and see the world.

TITLE: TWICE THE SOULS

TITLE: TWICE THE SOULS

TITLE: TWICE THE SOULS
